import React from 'react'; import { useEffect } from 'react'; import { MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBInput, MDBCheckbox, MDBBtn, MDBIcon, MDBTabs, MDBTabsItem, MDBTabsLink, MDBTabsContent, MDBTabsPane } from 'mdb-react-ui-kit'; import BirthdayPicker from './BirthdayPicker'; import { useState } from "react"; import Alert from "@mui/material/Alert"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { setEmail, setPassword, setRePassword, setName, setDate, setPhone, setAddress, setAlertMsg } from './features/registerSlice'; export default function RegisterCheck({ handleSubmit, route }) { const [loginRegisterActive, setLoginRegisterActive] = useState('register'); useEffect(() => { if(route === 'login') setLoginRegisterActive('login'); else setLoginRegisterActive('register'); }, []); const displayAlert = () => { if (alertMsg === "") return ""; if (!alertMsg.includes("successfully")) { return {alertMsg}; } else { return {alertMsg}; } }; return (
{displayAlert()}
setLoginRegisterActive('login')} active={loginRegisterActive === 'login'} > Login setLoginRegisterActive('register')} active={loginRegisterActive === 'register'} > Register
